actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of "Enactment of a Law and Other Aspects of the Legislative Branch of Government" as a Senate document.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of "Enactment of a Law and Other Aspects of the Legislative Branch of Government" as a Senate document. Directs that a specified number of additional copies be printed for the use of the Committee on Rules and Administration.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of "Enactment of a Law and Other Aspects of the Legislative Branch of Government" as a Senate document.
